title: DBMS Level 2 â€” Data Models & ER Model Basics
intro: This level focuses on data models, mainly the Entity-Relationship (ER) model, which is used to design databases conceptually.
points: Know the main types of data models: hierarchical, network, relational, object-oriented.
Understand what an Entity and Entity Set are.
Understand Attributes and types of attributes (simple, composite, single-valued, multi-valued, derived).
Know what a Relationship and Relationship Set are.
Basic idea of ER diagram components: rectangles, ellipses, diamonds, lines.
